trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around June 25th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsHello everyone. I came here the first time explaining the story how me and my family chased the UFO and I took those two disappointing photos. I will still remember that event however now I got some video of another sighting except this one wasn't superb like the first one, though I am sure I captured another UFO. This one is quite different as it appeared as a typical UFO that you see on YouTube. This looks like a classic UFO to me and if you look closely it appears that the UFO sways back and forth. Look at it a couple times after the edit than you will see what I am talking about. It is also heavily edited the reason why is because it was so bright outside that I couldn't see my LCD screen so it was hard to tell if I was capturing or not and I couldn't locate it perfectly until the last bit of the edit part of the video. When I lost it I thought that the object bolted but it appeared to go beneath the tree in my field of view and disappeared from my site. I should of checked it out closely by driving towards it if I could find it however I had to get ready to go to college that day and didn't have the time. So I wasn't really ready. Next time I plan to film it better and go full force and try to film the whole thing until I cannot see it. This is my second sighting of my life. If I had this camera before hand the first sighting would of been incredible. So I believe that something will happen soon and I want everyone to know that something out there exist.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
